author: jcorvel
msg: Fix the release build on Windows, by making sure svn_dbg__preamble,
svn_dbg__printf and svn_dbg__print_props are always defined, whether or not
(svn_dbg__print_props): Move the SVN_DEBUG #ifdef guard to inside this
function, where it's really needed (because of usage of SVN_DBG),
instead of #ifdef'ing around the entire file.
